Title: ConocoPhillips books regasification capacity at Dunkerque LNG
Description: ConocoPhilips said that it has booked 1.5 mtpa of regasification capacity at France’s 9.6 mtpa Dunkerque LNG import terminal, with the terminal use agreement starting in 2028.
Author: JS

Title: Greece-Bulgaria interconnector receives construction permit to expand capacity
Description: Gas Interconnector Greece-Bulgaria (ICGB) has obtained a construction permit for Lot 1 of its planned capacity expansion project from 3 billion m3 per year to 5 billion m3/year.
Author: JS

Title: Cheniere targets 75 mtpa of LNG output by early 2030s, eyes 100 mtpa with phased brownfield expansions
Description: Cheniere Energy is targeting LNG production capacity of approximately 75 mtpa by the early 2030s, with potential to exceed 100 mtpa over the next decade, as it advances a phased, brownfield-led growth strategy.
Author: CK

Title: China’s Zhoushan LNG terminal adds four more storage tanks, increases import capacity
Description: The ENN-operated Zhoushan LNG terminal in China’s Zhejiang province has commissioned four new 220,000 m3 LNG storage tanks as part of its third expansion phase, increasing the facility’s storage capacity to 1.52 million m3 and boosting its import capacity to 10 mtpa.
Author: CK

Title: LNG Canada receives second LNG ship this month amid loading pace scrutiny
Description: The Shell-led 14 mtpa LNG Canada project in Kitimat, British Columbia, has received its sixth LNG tanker, the 174,000 m3 Puteri Mayang, eight days after the previous ship’s arrival, marking the terminal’s second shipment this month amid growing market attention on its loading schedule following recent longer loading times and extended intervals between tanker arrivals.
Author: CK

Title: LNG Canada flags delay to Phase 2, seeks higher annual export volume
Description: The Shell-led LNG Canada project has signalled a significant delay to the start-up of its proposed second phase, now expected in the early 2030s—some six to seven years after Phase 1—while simultaneously applying to the Canada Energy Regulator to increase its maximum annual LNG export volume.
Author: CK
